comments.text: If any mappings between mirrors and a location in the DB exist (as written by sentry), deleting a location through the admin interface does not work due to foreign key errors.
comments.creator: bugmail@wenzel.io
comments.raw_text: If any mappings between mirrors and a location in the DB exist (as written by sentry), deleting a location through the admin interface does not work due to foreign key errors.
comments.author: bugmail@wenzel.io

comments.text:
I think I hit this today trying to delete a location:
 Warning at /admin/mirror/location/
 Out of range value adjusted for column 'location_mirror_map_id' at row 1
Does that match ? That was on 
 https://bounceradmin.mozilla.com/admin/mirror/location/?product__id__exact=1021
which no mirrors will actually be carrying the files.
comments.creator: nrthomas@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
I think I hit this today trying to delete a location:
 Warning at /admin/mirror/location/
 Out of range value adjusted for column 'location_mirror_map_id' at row 1
Does that match ? That was on 
 https://bounceradmin.mozilla.com/admin/mirror/location/?product__id__exact=1021
which no mirrors will actually be carrying the files.
